narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Brett Dinovi & Associates PA LLC is a Behavior Analyst provider based in Bensalem, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $74.8M in Medicaid payments across 182K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $74.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
